snippet: Many medical marijuana dispensaries and patients in Washington saw the new rules as a threat, but supporters said they were crucial as recreational sales became legal.
abstract: Legislation aimed at bringing Washington State’s largely unregulated medical marijuana system under state control dies without a vote as the House and Senate adjourn; state officials have said bill was crucial to maintaining order as the legalized sale of recreational marijuana begins this year.
lead_paragraph: Many medical marijuana dispensaries and patients in Washington saw the new rules as a threat, but supporters said they were crucial as recreational sales became legal.

headline.main: Medical Marijuana Bill Dies in Washington State
headline.print_headline: Medical Marijuana Bill Dies as Washington State Awaits Legal Recreational Sales
